titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the John M. Reid papers 1980.017
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was originally processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-07-05 15:33:52 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: The John M. Reid papers include a bond and deed concerning property property he owned in Brooklyn. The papers are dated 1861.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of two documents in a single folder.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, 1861; John M. Reid papers, 1980.017, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2024.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The John M. Reid papers include a bond and deed concerning property property he owned in Brooklyn. The papers are dated 1861.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials in this collection are in the public domain.

controlaccess.subject: Deeds
Real property -- New York (State) -- Kings County
